options: Yes. Regularised Via Latest Govt. Policies

Since the First Sale happened Before 1.1.1980 Town Planning Approval for Plot is Not Necessary.
Since the Properyt lies on Old Municipal Limit and having TS No. Town Planning Approval for Plot is Not Mandatory.
